summary: A comedy centered on a rock 'n' roll band that will do anything to become famous.
cast: Rob Stefaniuk|Jessica Paré|Paul Anthony|Mike Lobel|Chris Ratz|Alice Cooper|Moby|Henry Rollins|Iggy Pop|Dimitri Coats|Dave Foley|Alex Lifeson|Malcolm McDowell|Carole Pope|Barbara Mamabolo|Nicole de Boer|Calico Cooper|Danny Smith|Adam Kenneth Wilson|Anand Rajaram|Joe Pingue|Chris Barry|Rico Scuotto|Janson Aslin|Thalia Stefaniuk|Caleigh Barker
title: Suck
